column1:
Odeinoichus,"2016-08-01T23:07:28.813Z","Classic Looking Micro-Model from Creator.","

Set #30189 Transport Plane: LEGO’s Creator Polybags have gotten more and more impressive over the past few years, as a fan of microbuild polybag vehicles I do think that some are better than others, but many of them work as fun little sets to build and display or play with.
Let’s go on to the pros and cons of this polybag before we finish with the overall thoughts.

column2: Solid colour choices of dark blue and red with white and light stone grey mixed in. Pieces aren’t too rare, but look great and can be used for other builds if you so choose.
Main model build looks similar to some of the Creator Microbuild Helicopters, however remains unique. Design looks great and is fun to play with.
Vertical Take-off and Landing feature is included in such a small build, awesome design choice and works great.
• None really to speak of in this build.

column1: Honestly I think this is a stand out Creator Polybag, the build looks great and is great fun to play with or just have for a desk toy. I strongly recommend this one to fans of the polybags LEGO offers. Many of the Creator Polybags rarely suffer much, and this is one where I honestly didn’t find anything wrong with it. Again strongly recommended.
